alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Dauphin; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 4:18PM EDT until July 09 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Cumberland, Dauphin and York. * WHEN...Until 530 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 416 PM EDT, Heavy rain has ended across the area, with light showers tapering off through early evening. Minor flooding of low lying areas and small streams will slowly decrease through 530 PM. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Harrisburg, Lower Allen, Colonial Park, Weigelstown, Progress, Mechanicsburg, Middletown, Camp Hill, New Cumberland, Enola, Steelton, Lemoyne, Shiloh, West York, Lawnton, Valley Green, Wormleysburg, Bressler-Enhaut-Oberlin, Penbrook and Highspire. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
